errors.group_only: This command only works in groups.
errors.private_only: This command only works in private chats.
errors.admin_required: You need to be an admin to use this command.
errors.bot_admin_required: I need to be an admin to use this command.
errors.owner_only: This command is only for the owner.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.no_target: Please reply to a message or mention a user.
errors.not_in_group: User is not in this group.

antilink.enabled: Anti-link is now *enabled* for this group.
antilink.disabled: Anti-link is now *disabled* for this group.
antilink.warn_message: @{user}, links are not allowed in this group.

antidelete.enabled:
Anti-Delete is now *enabled*.

Deleted messages will be revealed!
antidelete.what_it_does: When enabled, if someone deletes a message in a group, the bot will re-send it so you can see what was deleted.
antidelete.forward_in_place: Deleted messages are replied in place.
antidelete.forward_hint: Use `{prefix}antidelete forward <jid>` or `{prefix}antidelete forward here` to forward elsewhere.
antidelete.forward_reply_in_place: Deleted messages will now be *replied in place*.
antidelete.forward_this_chat: Deleted messages will now be forwarded to *this chat*.
antidelete.forward_dm: Deleted messages will now be forwarded to *your DM*.
antidelete.forward_set: Deleted messages will now be forwarded to `{jid}`.

blacklist.warn_message: @{user}, your message was deleted for containing a blacklisted word.

warn.reset_all: All warnings reset for this group.
warn.not_admin: Limit reached but I'm not admin to {action}.

mute.no_muted: No users are muted in this group.

remind.no_reminders: No reminders set for this chat.
remind.provide_id: Please provide the reminder ID. Use `/remind list` to see IDs.
remind.no_message: Please provide a reminder message or reply to a message.
remind.usage:
üìù *Reminder Usage:*

`/remind 10m <msg>` - Remind in 10 minutes
`/remind 2h <msg>` - Remind in 2 hours
`/remind list` - List your reminders
`/remind cancel <id>` - Cancel a reminder

addcommand.exists: Command `{name}` already exists. Use `{prefix}delcommand {name}` to remove it first.
addcommand.load_failed: Failed to load the command after saving.
addcommand.help_desc: Send Python code that defines a Command class.
addcommand.no_command_class:
*No Command class found.*
Your code must define a class that inherits from `Command`.
addcommand.missing_name:
*Missing `name` attribute.*
Your Command class must have a `name` attribute.
addcommand.missing_execute:
*Missing `execute` method.*
Your Command class must have an `async def execute(self, ctx)` method.
addcommand.cannot_determine_name:
*Could not determine command name.*
Make sure `name` is a simple string like `name = "mycommand"`

sticker.reply_to_image: Reply to an image, video, or sticker to convert it.
sticker.image_only: Only images, short videos, and stickers can be converted.
sticker.convert_failed: Failed to convert media to sticker.
sticker.video_too_long: Video is too long. Maximum 6 seconds for animated stickers.

notes.saved: Note `{name}` ({type}) saved. Use #{name} to retrieve it.
notes.usage_save:
Reply to a message or provide content.
Usage: /save <name> [content]
notes.no_content: Please provide content or reply to a message/media.
notes.no_notes: No notes saved. Use /save <name> <content> to create one.

filter.usage:
Reply to a message or provide response.
Usage: /filter <trigger> [response]
filter.no_response: Please provide a response or reply to a message/media.
filter.set: Filter set ({type}): Messages containing `{trigger}` will trigger a response.
filter.no_filters: No filters set. Use /filter <trigger> <response> to create one.

setname.usage:
Provide the new group name.
Usage: {prefix}setname <new name>
setname.too_long: Group name must be 25 characters or less.

revoke.success:
Old link revoked. New invite link:
{link}

config.title: Config Command
config.owner_is_you: You are now the bot owner.
config.owner_usage: Usage: config owner set <jid> or config owner me
config.autoread_enabled: Auto-read enabled. Messages will be marked as read.
config.selfmode_status:
*Self Mode:* {status}

When enabled, bot only responds to your own messages.
config.selfmode_enabled: Self mode enabled. Bot will only respond to your own messages.
config.ai_no_key: API key not set. Set it first with: config ai key <key>
config.ai_unknown: Unknown AI command. Use `config ai` for help.

eval.async_usage:
Usage: aeval <code>

Example: aeval await bot.send(msg.chat_jid, 'Hello!')

delete.reply_required: Reply to a message you want to delete.

members.add_usage:
Provide phone number(s) to add.
Usage: {prefix}add <number>
members.no_targets:
Reply to a message or mention users.
Usage: {prefix}{command} @user1 @user2

echo.usage:
Please provide a message to echo.

Usage: /echo <message>

info.title: Zero Ichi Bot
info.description: A WhatsApp bot built with Neonize.

roll.title: Dice Roll
roll.usage:
Format: `{prefix}roll [count]d[sides][+/-modifier]`

Examples:
{bullet} `{prefix}roll` {arrow} Roll 1d6
{bullet} `{prefix}roll d20` {arrow} Roll 1d20
{bullet} `{prefix}roll 2d6` {arrow} Roll 2d6
{bullet} `{prefix}roll 3d8+5` {arrow} Roll 3d8 and add 5

poll.title: Create a Poll
poll.usage:
Usage: `{prefix}poll "Question" "Option 1" "Option 2" ...`

Add `--multi` to allow multiple selections.

*Example:*
`{prefix}poll "Favorite color?" "Red" "Blue" "Green"`
`{prefix}poll "Pick foods" "Pizza" "Burger" --multi`
poll.need_options:
You need a question and at least 2 options.
Wrap each in quotes: `{prefix}poll "Question" "Opt 1" "Opt 2"`

rules.title: Group Rules
rules.no_rules:
No rules set for this group.

Admin can set rules with:
`{prefix}rules set <your rules here>`
rules.provide_text:
Provide the rules text.

Usage: `{prefix}rules set <your rules>`
rules.unknown_action:
Unknown action.

Usage:
{bullet} `{prefix}rules` - Show rules
{bullet} `{prefix}rules set <text>` - Set rules
{bullet} `{prefix}rules clear` - Clear rules

lock.locked: Group *locked*. Only admins can send messages.

downloader.choose_result_hint: Reply with the number to select a video.
